summary:
DragonsEnhanced makes all dragons harder to fight and kill.

Each dragon in Skyrim has been changed to allow for a longer and tougher battle. All dragons are leveled and are capable of casting magic spells and Dragon Shouts. Different dragon classes and rank of dragon in each class, has spells and shouts they can do.
descriptionHtml:
DragonsEnhanced makes all dragons harder to fight and kill.

Each dragon in Skyrim has been changed to allow for a longer and tougher battle. All dragons are leveled and are capable of casting magic spells and Dragon Shouts. Different dragon classes and rank of dragon in each class, has spells and shouts they can do. There are also spells and shouts that all dragons can use.

The dragon shouted for that storm you see in some of the pics. My Blades are getting hit by lightning while they\'re fighting the Forsworn. This battle went on for about an hour.

Dragons can also heal and protect themselves if they have enough mana points left.

Skyrim Nexus link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15765
author: ItsMeToo - klcjr on Steam
